thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-TPI Composites Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.17

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TPI Composites Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.17
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - TPI Composites Inc:
* TPI COMPOSITES, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 EARNINGS RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.17 * Q4 SALES $247.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $251.7 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.19 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY ‍TOTAL BILLINGS OF $242.7 MILLION​ * SEES ‍2018 TOTAL BILLINGS AND NET SALES UNDER ASC 606 OF BETWEEN $1.0 BILLION AND $1.05 BILLION​
* SEES ‍ 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF BETWEEN $75 MILLION AND $80 MILLION UNDER ASC 606​
* SEES ‍ 2018 FULLY DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF BETWEEN $0.38 AND $0.42 UNDER ASC 606​
* SEES ‍ 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE BETWEEN $85 MILLION AND $90 MILLION (APPROX. 85% GROWTH RELATED)​
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.43 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
